name: Tap Tap Defenders
description:
Meteor is hurling towards earth we must stop it before all life is wiped out .

TAp TAp Defender:  is a super simple game to pass the time. 

See if you can beat your last score or send to your friends and see if they can beat yours. 

Game is designed around mobile screen and does not size up well for computer monitors. 

Hope you all enjoy.
